Do not show this message again: Do not show this message again
Start by uploading the file and selectin: Start by uploading the file and selecting the parts and plugins you want to apply. If there are any overlaps between the kit and your current design, you’ll be able to choose which imported parts you want to apply or ignore. Once the file is ready, the kit will be applied to your site and you’ll be able to see it live.
To turn your site into a Website Kit, se: To turn your site into a Template Kit, select the templates, content, settings and plugins you want to include. Once it’s ready, you’ll get a .zip file that you can import to other sites.
A Website Kit is a .zip file that contai: A Template Kit is a .zip file that contains all the parts of a complete site. It’s an easy way to get a site up and running quickly.
Add the custom posts types to export. Th: Add the custom posts types to export. The latest 20 items from each type will be included.
No custom post types in your site...
Click to select custom post types: Click to select custom post types
Parts of this kit overlap with your site: Parts of this kit overlap with your site’s templates, design and settings. The items you leave checked on this list will replace your current design.
Import a Website Kit to your site: Import a Template Kit to your site
Importing your content, templates and si: Importing your content, templates and site settings
Head over to Updates and make sure that: Head over to Updates and make sure that your plugins are updated to the latest version.
If you\u2019ve purchased, installed & ac: If you’ve purchased, installed & activated Elementor Pro, we can continue importing all the parts of this site.
There are few plugins that we couldn't i: There are few plugins that we couldn't install:
Make sure your Elementor Pro account is: Make sure your Elementor Pro account is connected
This file type is not allowed: This file type is not allowed
Without Elementor Pro, importing compone: Without Elementor Pro, importing components like templates, widgets and popups won't work.
All items are already selected by defaul: All items are already selected by default. Uncheck the ones you don't want.
Select which parts you want to apply: Select which parts you want to apply
If you don't include them, this kit may: If you don't include them, this kit may not work properly.
You can\u2019t use this Website Kit beca: You can’t use this Template Kit because it doesn’t contain any content, pages, etc. Try again with a different file.
The Website Kit you\u2019re using contai: The Template Kit you’re using contains plugins for functionality, but no content or pages, etc.
This allows Elementor to scan your SVGs: This allows Elementor to scan your SVGs for malicious content. Otherwise, you can skip any SVGs in this import.
Nothing to worry about, just continue wi: Nothing to worry about, just continue without importing SVGs or go back and start the import again.
To import or export these components, yo: To import or export these components, you’ll need Elementor Pro.
Select the items you want to keep and ap: Select the items you want to keep and apply:
Your site's homepage will be determined: Your site's homepage will be determined by the kit. You can change this later.
Don't close this window until the proces: Don't close this window until the process is finished.
This usually takes a few moments.
We\u2019re sorry, but something went wro: We’re sorry, but something went wrong. Click on ‘Learn more’ and follow each of the steps to quickly solve it.
